root.name: Time Cruise
root.description: OverviewIn this pinball game you don't just bounce a silver ball around a table, you also move it through the fifth dimension -- time! With tables as diverse as a 45,000 year old prehistoric golf course to the outer regions of space, your pinball wizardry will be put to the test.Critical ReceptionWhen the TG-CD version was released Electronic Gaming Monthly issued the following scores, 5,6,6,5 adding, "...I really like the huge play field. This side-wise scrolling was a rare treat that I hadn;t seen before. There could have been more things to shoot at but what was there was done quite well".
